PersonExamination.name: PersonExamination
PersonExamination.description: Represents the examinations taken by a person.

AccountId.description: The Account associated with the Person Examination.

ContactId.description: ID of the contact related to this record.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date from which the examination is effective from.

EffectiveTo.description: Date till which the examination is effective.

InstitutionName.description: Name of the institution offering the examination.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this record.

ParentPersonExaminationId.description: The parent Person Examination associated with this examination.

ScoreType.description: Specifies the type of examination score.

SubjectName.description: Specifies the academic subject associated with the examination.

VerificationDateTime.description: Date and time the examination details were verified.

VerificationStatus.description: Status of the examination details verification.
